Package moa.clusterers.kmeanspm

Class ClusteringTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.clusterers.kmeanspm.ClusteringTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, MOAObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusteringTreeHeadNode

    public class ClusteringTreeNode
extends AbstractMOAObject
    Provides a tree of ClusterFeatures. Citation: Hendrik Fichtenberger, Marc Gill√©, Melanie Schmidt, Chris Schwiegelshohn, Christian Sohler: BICO: BIRCH Meets Coresets for k-Means Clustering. ESA 2013: 481-492 (2013) http://ls2-www.cs.tu-dortmund.de/bico/
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
